gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 107, Heat 100
gameRecap.excerpt: Oklahoma City outscored the Heat, 60-43 in the second half and won the game, 107-100. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had a game-high 37 points on 13-25 FG, along with five rebounds and six assists to lead the Thunder. He scored 12 points in the final frame, and 10 of the 12 in the final three minutes. Jaime Jaquez Jr. led the Heat with 25 points as Jimmy Butler added 20 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists. The Thunder move to 44-19 as the Heat move to 35-28.
